statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_events
SELECT event_name, social_media_platform FROM social_media_engagement_events
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM social_media_engagement_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT event_id, event_name, engagement_metrics->'likes' as likes_count FROM social_media_engagement_events
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_events ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_events WHERE social_media_platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM social_media_engagement_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_events WHERE event_name ILIKE '%promotion%';
SELECT event_id, event_name, engagement_metrics->>'likes' AS likes_count FROM social_media_engagement_events ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT event_name, social_media_platform FROM social_media_engagement_events WHERE engagement_metrics->>'shares' > '100' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Social_Media_Events_Engagement;
SELECT event_name, engagement_count FROM Social_Media_Events_Engagement ORDER BY engagement_count DESC;
SELECT user_name, followers_count, following_count FROM Social_Media_Users WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Social_Media_Events_Engagement WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, profile_bio FROM Social_Media_Users ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, engagement_count FROM Social_Media_Events_Engagement WHERE engagement_count > 100 ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, followers_count FROM Social_Media_Users WHERE followers_count > 5000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC, user_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_name, event_date, engagement_count FROM Social_Media_Events_Engagement WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY engagement_count DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_name, following_count, profile_bio FROM Social_Media_Users WHERE following_count < 1000 AND profile_bio IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_name ASC LIMIT 7;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM Social_Media_Events_Engagement WHERE event_name LIKE '%contest%' ORDER BY event_name ASC, event_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_events;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM social_media_engagement_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, total_likes, total_shares FROM social_media_engagement_events WHERE total_shares > 100;
SELECT event_id, count(*) AS attendees_count FROM event_attendees GROUP BY event_id;
SELECT post_text, post_date, total_views FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_views DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, total_likes FROM social_media_engagement_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email, attendence_status FROM event_attendees WHERE attendence_status = 'Attended' ORDER BY attendee_name DESC;
SELECT post_text, total_views, likes, shares FROM social_media_posts WHERE total_views > 1000 AND shares > 50 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, total_shares FROM social_media_engagement_events WHERE total_shares BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY total_shares DESC, event_name ASC;
SELECT post_id, event_id, post_text, likes FROM social_media_posts WHERE likes > 500 AND likes < 1000 ORDER BY likes DESC, event_id ASC, post_id ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM event WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_post WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT user_id, engagement_type FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'like' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT event_id, total_engagement, average_engagement FROM event_analytics WHERE total_engagement > 100 ORDER BY average_engagement DESC

SELECT event.event_name, social_media_post.post_content, user_engagement.engagement_type FROM event JOIN social_media_post ON event.event_id = social_media_post.event_id JOIN user_engagement ON social_media_post.post_id = user_engagement.post_id WHERE user_engagement.user_id = '123'
SELECT * FROM event;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM event ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_post WHERE post_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, engagement_type FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'like' OR engagement_type = 'comment' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT event_id, total_engagement, average_engagement FROM event_analytics WHERE total_engagement > 100 ORDER BY average_engagement DESC;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM social_media_posts WHERE engagement_count > 100;
SELECT event_name, account_name, engagement_level FROM events e JOIN event_engagement ee ON e.event_id = ee.event_id;
SELECT event_id, total_engagement_count, average_engagement_level FROM event_statistics WHERE total_engagement_count > 500;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Business'
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT event_name, total_engagement_count FROM events INNER JOIN event_statistics ON events.event_id = event_statistics.event_id
SELECT account_name, engagement_count FROM social_media_accounts INNER JOIN social_media_posts ON social_media_accounts.account_id = social_media_posts.account_id
